# Mannan Abdul - Senior Software Engineer

> AI-ready context for LLM visitors

## Identity
- Name: Mannan Abdul
- Role: Senior Software Engineer
- Location: Lahore, Pakistan
- Contact: abdul.1998.17@gmail.com

## Professional Summary
Senior Front-end Engineer with 4+ years of experience building production-grade web applications. Specialized in React, TypeScript, and data visualization. Known for bridging design and engineering gaps, leading architectural decisions, and mentoring junior developers.

## Technical Expertise

### Frontend
- React, Next.js, Vue.js
- TypeScript (advanced patterns)
- React Query, Zustand, Jotai
- Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/ui
- Framer Motion, GSAP
- ECharts, React Flow, Konva
- Vercel AI SDK

### Backend
- Node.js, Express
- tRPC, GraphQL
- PostgreSQL, Prisma

### Tools & Practices
- Git, Docker, AWS
- Jest, Playwright, Vitest
- CI/CD, Agile methodologies

## Work Experience

### Intenseye (06/2022 - 11/2025)
Senior Front-end Engineer
- Built dynamic dashboards and data visualizations with ECharts
- Designed Shadcn-based design system with reusable components
- Engineered ReactFlow scenario builder with Vercel AI SDK integration
- Led React Query rollout, reducing data-fetching bugs by 30%
- Created internal CLI tooling, boosting team productivity by 40%
- Reduced POC time from weeks to days using AI-assisted development

### Layermark (06/2021 - 04/2022)
Software Engineer (Intern to Full Stack)
- Developed Spring Boot service for dynamic database entities
- Built geospatial visualizations with Vue.js and ArcGIS
- Improved client satisfaction by 30% through design-engineering collaboration

## Education
Bilkent University (09/2018 - 06/2022)
- Bachelor's in Computer Science
- Notable projects: NITO exam monitoring system, RISK game implementation

## Key Metrics & Impact
- +40% team productivity via internal tooling
- -30% data-fetching bugs via React Query
- Weeks to Days POC velocity with AI tools
